name: @nomercy235/weather-app
description: A simple app which gives the weather for a location.

scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist/ && mkdir dist/ && cp -R {package.json,index.js,weather/,geocode/,.gitignore,README.md} dist
scripts.package: npm run deploy && npm publish --access public dist/

author: Alexandru Florian Barascu <alex.florin2352@gmail.com>
